JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Description       Building out high-availability, test-driven web application with PHP, YII2, HTML5 and CSS     Maximizing software functionality across front end, business logic layer and database to delight our users     Finding ideas to enhance existing code and striving for perfection     Working with ourbusiness team, development team and project managers to make a fantastic product        Qualifications       3+ years experience with PHP web application   development with MySQL     Knowledge of an MVC framework : YII2/YII/Zend /ZF2/ Laravel/ Symfony2        Strong skills in XML & Web services (SOAP, REST)     Experience with (x)HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Jquery, Angular JS       Experience of implementing W3C standards and best practices     Strong debugging skills, code flow analysis and the ability to read and modify existing code     Strong knowledge of SDLC       Educational Requirements      Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or Master in Computer Applications
